post:
PrimaHost offered SSD KVM plans in France. Our VPS’s support a wide range of Operating Systems such as Ubuntu, Debian, CentOS and Windows Server.  
We accept payments via PayPal, credit/debit cards (via Stipe), Webmoney and Bitcoin (via Webmoney USD).  

**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SSD-512**  
• CPU: 1 vCore  
• RAM: **512MB**  
• Hard Drive: **20GB SSD**  
• Swap: 512MB  
• IP addresses: 1 IPv4, 2 IPv6  
• Port Speed: 1Gbit  
• Bandwidth: **1TB**  
• OS: **Linux**  
• Features: Anti-DDoS  
• Control Panel: SolusVM  
• **2,25 €/mo. | $2.5/mo.**  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[Order Link](https://www.primahost.info/cart.php?a=add&pid=46)  

**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SSD-768**  
• CPU: 1 vCore  
• RAM: **768MB**  
• Hard Drive: **25GB SSD**  
• Swap: 768MB  
• IP addresses: 1 IPv4, 2 IPv6  
• Port Speed: 1Gbit  
• Bandwidth: **2TB**  
• OS: **Linux**  
• Features: Anti-DDoS  
• Control Panel: SolusVM  
• **3,33 €/mo. | $3.7/mo.**  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[Order Link](https://www.primahost.info/cart.php?a=add&pid=47)  

**&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SSD-1GB**  
• CPU: 1 vCore  
• RAM: **1024MB**  
• Hard Drive: **30GB SSD**  
• Swap: 1024MB  
• IP addresses: 1 IPv4, 2 IPv6  
• Port Speed: 1Gbit  
• Bandwidth: **2TB**  
• OS: **Linux / Windows**  
• Features: Anti-DDoS  
• Control Panel: SolusVM  
• **4,5 €/mo. | $5/mo.**  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[Order Link Linux](https://www.primahost.info/cart.php?a=add&pid=48)  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[Order Link Windows](https://www.primahost.info/cart.php?a=add&pid=65)  

and others.
